item.title: NET MAUI Deployment Apple Developer Certificates Guide
item.description: The following is a quick guide that I found very helpful after signing up for the Apple Developer program and wanting to quickly get my app up and running on my own device! It was generated by ChatGPT. Here is a step-by-step guide on how to set up and deploy a .NET 8 MAUI iOS application to an iPhone, including obtaining the necessary certificates and other steps not covered by .
